title: All this Akali QQ is making me want to try her
body: I found her too boring to try even once before the rework, and the rework initially seemed kind of silly, to be honest. But the constant stream of threads and posts about all the cool things she can do is making her sound kind of fun. Gameplay board, your clever marketing campaign has succeeded!

replies.body: Had an Akali shard on my main account. Bought her, tried her, hated her.
